data.name: ReadCsePersonAddress
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, CSP_NUMBER, ZDEL_START_DATE, SEND_DATE, SOURCE, STREET_1, STREET_2, CITY, TYPE, WORKER_ID, VERIFIED_DATE, END_DATE, END_CODE, ZDEL_VERIFIED_CODE, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, STREET_3, STREET_4, PROVINCE, POSTAL_CODE, COUNTRY, LOCATION_TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERS_ADDR where (IDENTIFIER = @identifier) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (LOCATION_TYPE = 'F')

data.name: UpdateCsePersonAddress
data.value: update CKT_CSE_PERS_ADDR set SEND_DATE = @sendDate, SOURCE = @source, STREET_1 = @street1, STREET_2 = @street2, CITY = @city, TYPE = @type, WORKER_ID = @workerId, VERIFIED_DATE = @verifiedDate, END_DATE = @endDate, END_CODE = @endCode, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, STREET_3 = @street3, STREET_4 = @street4, PROVINCE = @province, POSTAL_CODE = @postalCode, COUNTRY = @country, LOCATION_TYPE = @locationType where (IDENTIFIER = @identifier) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)
